value.title: Canada creates C$1 billion fund to fight coronavirus, set to spend more
value.excerpt: OTTAWA — Canada is setting up a C$1 billion ($728 million) fund to help its provinces combat a worsening coronavirus outbreak and is prepared to spend more money if necessary, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said on Wednesday.
